kpi_info.title: Update PDP context attempts, SGSN initiated
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the number of GTP-C v1 update PDP context request messages received (SGSN (or access network) initiated). Update PDP context Request received: - Gn/Gp interface (SGSN -> GGSN/Combined S-GW and P-GW with Gn interface)
